attributes.title: Shiva -- The Master of Masters www.LifeBliss.org
attributes.description: From Works of Enlightened Master Paramahamsa Nithyananda.  In this discourse taken from Shiva Sutras Swamiji talks about the all inclusiveness of Mahadeva, Shiva.  Shiva provides all kinds of meditation techniques based on the types of individuals for their transformation and does not give up on any individual.  This discourse titled "Tune in to Bliss" may be purchased online at www.lifeblissgalleria.com.
